Title: Crossroads (1)
Plot: Baltar's trial testimony threatens the very stability of the fleet. Lee assists Romo Lampkin in Baltar's defense.Some in the fleet begin to feel that Baltar is divine. Though he dismisses such beliefs, Number Six suggests that the followers may know more about his true nature than Baltar does himself.
GuestStars: William Samples, Susan Hogan, Nicki Clyne, Mark A. Sheppard, Keegan Connor Tracy, Alison Matthews, Colin Lawrence, Leah Cairns, Ryan Robbins, Chelah Horsdal, Michael Trucco, Kandyse McClure, Alessandr
